author: Antonio Olivo, Ovetta Wiggins, Gregory S. Schneider
title: Stay-home orders issued in Maryland, Virginia, DC on Monday - The - The Washington Post
description: Stay-home orders issued in Maryland, Virginia, DC on Monday - The The Washington Post View Full Coverage on Google News
content:
We are no longer asking or suggesting Marylanders to stay home, Gov. Larry Hogan said during a news conference in Annapolis. We are directing them.
Nearly 3,000 residents of the greater Washington region have tested positive for covid-19, and 53 people have … [+9049 chars]
